title: Get your favorite film or TV fan a TeeVee subscription for just $39.99
content:
Macworld

If you know someone who can spend hours scrolling through Netflix looking for something new to watch, here’s a gift idea that can help them get all those hours back.

But just so we’re clear – TeeVee is no simple media tracking app. It’s a curated approach to watching movies and TV, helping viewers personalize their media consumption so they’ll always know what film or TV show to watch next.

With a cutting-edge intuitive design and interface, the TeeVee app basically serves as a media concierge, guiding users to movies and shows that suit their specific taste, cultivating a watch list, and making sure no one ever thinks “there’s nothing to watch” ever again.

This fluidly simple app keeps track of the shows a member watches, alerts them when new episodes are available, and guides them to the streaming service that is hosting those episodes. And while most apps focus exclusively on either film or television, TeeVee handles both, integrating all of your viewing together.

But TeeVee has a mind of its own too. Based on trending items, TeeVee will make personalized recommendations for the next binge session, then use individual watchlists to help map a viewer’s personal journey to all the best films and shows. At a glance, a viewer can see what they’ve watched, and all the video treasures they still need to dive into.

With an impressive 4.8 out of 5-star rating among users in the Apple App Store, TeeVee is dedicated to ending the practice of binge scrolling once and for all.

Regularly $89.97, you can get a lifetime subscription to a TeeVee Premium membership for yourself or your favorite cinephile or TV junkie now at more than half off, down to just $39.99 during this limited-time, best-price-on-the-web sale.
